Plot: Set in Venice, and featuring the charismatic Commissario Guido Brunetti, this is the fourth novel in Donna Leon's critically acclaimed series.
Characters: Commissario Guido Brunetti, Vice-Questore Patta, Signorina Elettra, Paola Brunetti, Ispettore Vianello, Barbara Zorzi, Chiara Brunetti, della Corte
